name: Bingo House
description:
*** The 1st Bingo Battle game on Mobile! ***
*** It's now Bingo House Time! Compete against other players to be the winner! ***
Bingo House is finally out to allow players to compete against other players and call on numbers from each other to make the winning patterns. You have to strategize your calls and daub carefully in order to make the 3 winning patterns first to win! There are 2 modes playable, first is CLASSIC MODE where players compete one another like in poker style and second mode is POWER-UP MODE where, you can use unique power-items like one, two free daubs, extra coins and many more to use your advantage! As you level up you can move to higher rooms to win greater rewards and bonuses! Can you be the first to make 3 winning patterns in a round to achieve ultimate reward in a game? Try now and daub all the way to be the 1st to win!

* PLAY BINGO IN A BATTLE MODE*
- Play Bingo game like never before! Numbers are called by players and compete one another to be 1st in BINGO!

* CLASSIC MODE *
- Play like in Poker style mode where you can compete with other players and fold the card if you have to.

* POWER-UP MODE *
- Use power-ups to increase your chance of getting a bingo and boost your chance to the maximum!

* USE UNIQUE ITEMS *
- Having no luck on getting a BINGO? Now you can use unique items like switch card with other player or disturb your rivals by changing the daubed numbers for confusion!

* COLLECT PUZZLES *
- You can collect Puzzles through Treasure Chests in each Bingo rooms to receive EXTRA BONUS

* CUSTOMIZABLE AVATARS *
- Choose your own style of avatars to pimp your character in the game.
